original_text: Ever since God saved us, we have continued to wait for this to happen. One day, we will receive what we have hoped for. Then we will not need to hope for it any more. Nobody continues to hope for something that he has already.
korean_text: 우리가 소망으로 구원을 얻었으매 보이는 소망이 소망이 아니니 보는 것을 누가 바라리요

sentences.original_text: we have continued to wait for this to happen
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 이 일이 일어나기를 계속 기다려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: One day, we will receive what we have hoped for
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가 우리는 바랐던 것을 받을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Then we will not need to hope for it any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 우리는 더 이상 그것을 바랄 필요가 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Nobody continues to hope for something
